Answer:
<<<api>>>: PrintWriter.write
<<<code>>>:
PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter("output.txt"));
out.write("Stochastic programming is an area of mathematical programming that studieshow to model decision problems under uncertainty. For example, although adecision might be necessary at a given point in time, essential informationmight not be available until a later time.");
out.close();
<<<explanation>>>:
This code will write the text to a file called output.txt.

A: I'm not sure what you mean by "using this api: PrintWriter.write".  The write method of PrintWriter takes a String as an argument.  It doesn't take a File.
